attributes.review: I got this app to track the Trump campaign and to see what I was really voting for when I vote for Donald J. Trump in the 2020 election. I am a big Trump supporter who goes back to 2016, and if Iâ€™m really being honest, this app has been terrible. It is slow, glitchy, and a waist of storage. The app constantly blacks out and closes. I cannot go one minute without it glitchy or blacking out. I can see why the ratings are so bad. I would highly recommend not getting this app, but instead going on to Foxnews.com. If you read this far, hereâ€™s my real opinion, ğŸ–•ğŸ¼Trump!
